climbs.name: L. Ron Hubbards Stack of Rocks

content.description: This is any easy route, however is not just a walk up like introduction to rock climbing. the crux is the mantle at the end though do not be scared away by it as it has some good jugs to hold on to to complete the mantle.
content.location: this route is in the center of the rock face of the boulder (the other face is all grass).

climbs.name: L. Ron Hubbard's Stack of Rocks Mantle

content.description: The reason this is a V0 is because the mantle is slightly difficult due to the overhanging rock above it. After finishing the mantle go off to the right about 5 feet and proceed to top the boulder at the second finish mantle.
content.protection: Bouldering Crash mat. for some reason people followed me to this are and started climbing in this area with no protection and were fine due to the low risk of falling, do that at your own risk.

content.description: go straight up starting at the crack in between the stacked rocks, then use the middle crack that forms a 1 inch ledge in the middle of the rock and finish by mantling.
content.location: On top of the 3 longer boulder routes next to dianetics.

climbs.name: Introduction to Rock Climbing
climbs.fa: 4-8-19 unknown climber (sitting at the top of the rock in the area photo)

content.description: This is an extremely easy v-easy. good for teaching people how to boulder who come from the gym or have never climbed before. Many jugs and big slopers with giant footholds everywhere, as well as the worlds easiest mantle.
content.protection: no protection has been used for any ascent so far.
content.location: located the right most of all routes in L. Ron Hubbards boulder

content.description:
This is the only worth while route at L. Ron Hubbard's Boulder unless you came there to learn how to do outdoor bouldering.

Start at the crack depicted in the photo where the two routes split. Use the cracks and ledges to make your way to the top. Mantle without using the other rock below and only on the rock with the cracks for true v0+
content.protection: You can bring a small crash pad
content.location: You must first use one of the three lower down routes to get up to a cliff where this boulder is present. You can also walk up the other side.
